venue.name: Charles River Canoe and Kayak, Newton Boathouse

item.description:
Come join us for some fun canoeing or kayaking on the Charles River in Newton.

We will rent boats from Charles River Canoe and Kayak. We usually have 2 to 3 in a canoe. The Kayaks fit one or two individuals. All levels are welcome.

Cost: Large canoes for 4-5 adults are $24/hr. Double kayaks are $18/hr. This is cost per hour for each canoe or kayak. Please see their website for more details.

*We have 2 groupons for Charles River Kayaking which will lower our cost.

Here are directions to their Newton location:http://www.paddlebost...

Dinner afterwards will be at Le's at the Atrium Mall afterwards. It's on Level 1 of the mall.

300 Boylston Street
Chestnut Hill, MA 02467

Hope you can make it!



PS - Transportation is your own responsibility. However, if you need a ride, please note where you are located or which T stop you can meet at. Our members are very good about offering rides if they can.

We can also arrange to pick people up at a Newton T stop if needed.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Canoeing/Kayaking on the Charles (Newton)
